title: James Goode
text: James Goode (born 5 September 1982, <a href="Cardiff">Cardiff</a>, <a href="Wales">Wales</a>) is a <a href="Welsh%20people">Welsh</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played for the <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a> in the <a href="Pro14">Celtic League</a> but left the team at the end of the 2007–08 season. He also played for the <a href="Manawatu%20Turbos">Manawatu Turbos</a> in <a href="Palmerston%20North">Palmerston North</a>, <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>. Goode's position of choice is at <a href="lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>. He began the 2011–12 season playing for the <a href="Ospreys%20%28rugby%20union%29">Ospreys</a>, but has since moved to the Newcastle Falcons on loan.
